summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Repairwear Anti-Gravity Eye Cream virtually defies gravity. Helps lift up. Reduces crepiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsDensely hydrating cream helps visibly lift around the eyes.Helps erase the look of fine lines.Builds cushion into time-thinned skin.Even the first application creates a cushiony feel and a brighter look.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESFragranceItem 2282505How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Polybutene, Sucrose, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Cetyl Esters, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Glucoside, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Protéine Du Petit-Lait, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Linoleic Acid, Cholesterol, Caffeine, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Squalane, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-8, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Polysilicone-11, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, PEG-100 Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stearic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Potassium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice a day, morning and night. With ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion.
ingredients: Mica.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again depending on the price increas
reviews.comments: I really like this product, however the price keeps going up and I may soon be unable to afford it.

reviews.headline: best eye cream ever
reviews.comments: I love this cream. I have very bad dry eyes and the skin under my eyes is puffy and dry. I use this twice a day and I can tell if I miss one day! I love love it! Its a bit pricy but I always have a coupon code when I order from Ulta! I will never NOT use this! Love it!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Reslly been enjoying this eye cream. Works well snd i wake up with no puffy eyes and i feel its overall making my under eyes look younger

reviews.headline: Using this for years
reviews.comments: This actually works! I tried to stop using this stuff for a few weeks and that was a mistake. I started using another high end product and was not happy with my results. The other stuff i tried went in the trash and I ran to ulta to restock on this! This product last for a long time. Well worth the price.

reviews.headline: doesn't work for me
reviews.comments: Another Clinique item that is pricey and did nothing and actually caused little whiteheads.   I wish I could get my money back! too late though

reviews.headline: Love Repairwear Antigravity Uplifting Eye Cream
reviews.comments: I have used this Eye Cream for 30+ Years, it's the best I have ever used. It helps with Uplifting & Wrinkles. At 68 years old, I highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Have purchased this product for years
reviews.comments: Recommended by a friend many years ago. Tried other products only to return them and immediately purchased another anti gravity.

reviews.headline: Useless
reviews.comments: Expensive and ineffective.  Don't bother.

reviews.headline: Best ever
reviews.comments: best eye cream ever, I've tried them all!

reviews.headline: My night time go to
reviews.comments: I use this one at night. Works wonders

reviews.headline: Helps sagging eyelids
reviews.comments: I don't know why some reviews said they thought this was a large jar ? It's a small jar like the other eye creams. This one has helped my sagging eyelids. I haven't used this for puffiness under my eyes.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Product works as advertised.

reviews.headline: ❤️ this project.
reviews.comments: I'm hooked on this product.

reviews.headline: An eye cream I keep buying
reviews.comments: I really love this eye cream. It has been something I've been using for the past 10 years, and I keep re-buying it because it's that good. It works for my skin type and I love it. It gives me great results.

reviews.headline: Awesome. This is the best product.
reviews.comments: My eyelids began drying out, becoming itchy and creepy. No OTC product I had found helped. My dermatologist tried 2 different prescription products that would help temporarily. The I found this - no creepiness, my eyes look lifted, I LOVE this stuff.

reviews.headline: Absolute must!
reviews.comments: This is a fantastic product. Please add this to take care of your skin routine.

reviews.headline: very hydrating and silky feeling
reviews.comments: This product leaves the skin feeling very hydrated.  It goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly.  The fact it doesn't irritate my very sensitive skin makes this a nearly perfect product.

reviews.headline: I purchase this product over and over!
reviews.comments: Great product for older skin! I'm in my 50's and have combination skin. It lifts and smooths the skin around the eye without leaving it dry, wrinkly, and tight. You only need a tiny bit. Even though the container is small, it lasts quite a long time and I use it twice a day.  I don't recall any fragrance.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: This product feels great on my eyes. I have been having dryness on my eyelids and it seems to have improved it. And, it dries well before I  apply makeup.  I would recommend and I would buy it again.

reviews.headline: Best eye cream ever!!!!!
reviews.comments: I've used this eye cream for several years. I recently ran out and used another product…..but not for long!!

faceoff_positive.comments: This product is wonderful! I had an awful patch of dry skin on my lid that was a result of a reaction to a different eye cream for over a month so I bought this as a super moisturizer to cure it. It cleared the dry patch after about 3 days and after the first week, I started seeing a huge change in the bags under my eyes and my eyelids started to firm up as well (A bonus since I was not buying this product for that purpose)! My eye shadow even looks smoother. I will buy this product faithfully!
faceoff_positive.headline: I love this product

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using the Anti-gravity firming eye cream for a while now and loved it! Was very disappointed that it was discontinued. I tried the repairwear anti-gravity and it just doesn't measure up. Luckily I was able to find some of the old Anti-gravity on another website. When something works, why would you discontinue it?
faceoff_negative.headline: Repairwear anti-gravity
